Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-34062 affecting package python-tqdm for versions less than 4.63.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-34062 affecting package python-tqdm for versions less than 4.63.1-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-tqdm is earlier than 4.63.1-3, affected by CVE-2024-34062
